definitions.definition: mechanical ; relating to mechanics or the laws of motion in physics
mechanical ; precise but lifeless , as if performed by machine
Of or relating to a mechanic or artificer, or to the class of artisans ; hence, rude; common; vulgar; base.

main_definition: ( archaic ) mechanical ; relating to mechanics or the laws of motion in physics
secondary_definitions: ( archaic ) mechanical ; precise but lifeless , as if performed by machine
( obsolete ) Of or relating to a mechanic or artificer, or to the class of artisans ; hence, rude; common; vulgar; base.
